text-heading: Sticker Gallery of the Stop&Glow Light Therapy Art Lamp Project
solo_1_desc: This gallery was created out of my interest in the interactive web and my fan base. This is a place where you can show your creativity by using a Stop&Glow lamp as a canvas for your stickers.
solo_2_desc: Here you can put the text for your sticker exhibition
team_1_desc: Here you can put the text for your team sticker exhibition
